DOC.brief_summary: The study aim investigate whether disease progression patient chronic heart failure ( CHF ) assess new biomarkers , determine diagnostic value . The study also intend describe comparison echocardiography cardiopulmonary function test CHF patient , relate cardiac functional parameter clinical outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Diagnostic Value Biomarkers Cardiac Functional Parameters Patients With Chronic Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Age ≥18 year symptoms sign NYHA Ⅱ~Ⅳ cardiac structural change confirm echocardiography severe disease combine alive less 12 month hard participate investigation accept followup visit pregnant lactate woman acute phase STelevation acute myocardial infarction , stroke , severe infection critical condition
